meaningMnemonic: This is a combination of the words 据える, meaning "to install," and 付ける, meaning "to attach." Put them together and you're still going <vocabulary>to install</vocabulary> something or <vocabulary>to equip</vocabulary> something. There's just more hands on work happening.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them when you learned the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
